member.name: T:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController
member.summary: Controller responsible for managing Licences and their associated options.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.GetById(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific licence by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the licence to retrieve.
member.returns: The requested licence if found; otherwise, NotFound.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.Create(Back.Modules.LicenceModule.Dtos.CreateLicenceDto)
member.param: The data to create the licence.
member.returns: The ID of the created licence.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.Update(System.String,Back.Modules.LicenceModule.Dtos.CreateLicenceDto)
member.param: The ID of the licence to update.
member.returns: No content if successful; otherwise, NotFound or BadRequest.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.Delete(System.String)
member.param: The ID of the licence to delete.
member.returns: No content if successful; otherwise, NotFound.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.GetAllOptions
member.returns: A list of all licence options.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.GetOptionById(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a licence option by ID.
member.param: The ID of the option to retrieve.
member.returns: The requested licence option if found; otherwise, NotFound.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.GetOptionsByLicenceId(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all options associated with a specific licence.
member.returns: A list of options for the specified licence.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.CreateOption(Back.Models.LicenceRelated.LicenceOption)
member.returns: The ID of the created option.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.UpdateOption(System.String,Back.Models.LicenceRelated.LicenceOption)
member.param: The ID of the option to update.
member.returns: No content if successful; otherwise, NotFound or BadRequest.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.LicenceModule.LicenceController.DeleteOption(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a licence option by ID.
member.param: The ID of the option to delete.
member.returns: No content if successful; otherwise, NotFound.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.SubscriptionModule.SubscriptionController.GetTierById(System.String)
member.summary: Get a subscription tier by its ID.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.SubscriptionModule.SubscriptionController.GetTiersBySubscriptionId(System.String)
member.summary: Get all tiers for a given subscription ID.

member.name: M:Back.Modules.SubscriptionModule.SubscriptionController.UpdateTier(System.String,Back.Models.SubscriptionRelated.SubscriptionTier)
